item.title: 什么是metadata
item.author: zhengpengde
item.description: 什么是metadata,带例子 metadata is simply data about data,It means it is a description and context of the data. It helps to organize, find and understand data. Here are a few real world examples of metadata. 元数据是数据的数据,这意味着他是数据的描述和上下文。它帮助我们了解和认识数据。下面有一些真是的关于元数据的例子。 Typical metadata Those are some typical metadata elements: Title and description, Tags and categories, Who created and when, Who last modified and when, Who can access or update. A photo Every time you take a photo with today’s cameras a bunch of metadata is gathered and saved with it
